mapper.insert: insert into algDetail (algBoardNo, writer, algDetailContent, algDetailResult,algDetailComment,algDetailTitle) values (#{algBoardNo},#{writer},#{algDetailContent},#{algDetailResult},#{algDetailComment},#{algDetailTitle});
mapper.update: update algDetail set algDetailTitle = #{algDetailTitle}, algDetailContent = #{algDetailContent}, algDetailResult = #{algDetailResult}, algDetailComment = #{algDetailComment}, writer = #{writer} where algDetailNo = #{algDetailNo}
mapper.insert: insert into reportBoard (boardNo, writer, reportReason, reporter, btypeNo, category) values (#{boardNo}, #{writer}, #{reportReason}, #{reporter}, #{btypeNo}, #{category});
mapper.select: select * from algBoard ab inner join algDetail ad on ab.boardNo = ad.algBoardNo order by ad.algDetailPostDate desc limit 5
